source:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_SEQ_00Maru is keeping his distance from a nearby crate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête avec limitation de job ou de classe
Il n'est possible de progresser dans cette quête qu'avec la classe ou le job qui a servi à la commencer.

Maru a un travail dangereux à vous confier.

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_00<tab>Use the Daemir Demolishers on the mudstone mound in the Shroud of the Samgha.
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_00<tab>Utiliser la bombe d'alchimiste sur la grosse mudstone, dans la jungle des Sangha

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone.
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the hunk of Ksiroda mudstone to Maru.
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_TODO_02<tab>Donner le fragment de mudstone à Maru

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_000<tab>I've been meanin' to ask you this for some time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but truth be told, I was nervous. Thought it might be too dangerous...
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, j'ai un travail à te confier, mais il est un peu dangereux...

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_001<tab>But then Kancana told me that your adventures've tossed you into the maw of death an' back again. I figure handlin' some explosives is child's play compared to that...right?
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_001<tab>Kancana m'a dit que tu avais l'habitude de gérer des requêtes diverses et variées... Est-ce que tu prends en charge des demandes... explosives, au sens propre comme au figuré<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_002<tab>...Well, you're still here, so I'll take that as a sign of tacit agreement. We need someone to break up the mudstone around Ksiroda an' bring back a piece. The alchemists keep tellin' me this is the best way, but...just mind your fingers, alright?
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_002<tab>Qui ne dit mot consent<var 1D /var>! Utilise <var 33 ((EventItem)) 07F61E91CF0202 /var> pour faire exploser une grosse mudstone et en récupérer un fragment. Fais très attention en manipulant la bombe.

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_010<tab>There you are─an' with fingers an' toes still attached! I take it that means the alchemists were right after all.
TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_011<tab>Good, good─these'll do it. Mixin' mudstone into water makes a paste that keeps the skin safer from sun an' wind than just about anythin'.
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_011<tab>Dissoudre des fragments de mudstone dans l'eau permet d'obtenir une boue à texture fine qui peut servir d'écran solaire naturel.

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_012<tab>You might not think it to look at 'em, but hippos have a delicate hide. If you don't keep it nice and moist, it'll crack like so much mud on a hot day. We're really in your debt this time.
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_012<tab>La peau des hippopotames est plus sensible qu'elle n'en a l'air, elle s'abîme vite si on ne l'hydrate pas suf<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>sam<var 16 /var>ment. C'est pour cette raison que je t'ai confié ce travail.

source: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_013<tab>Sure, maybe you could've just broken up the stone with a hammer an' chisel...but now I don't gotta worry about someone accidentally settin' those demolishers alight an' blowin' us all into the next life, neither.
target: TEXT_BANARK121_04571_MARU_000_013<tab>Je vais de ce pas commencer à préparer l'onguent avec les autres. Tiens, accepte cette récompense en guise de re<var 16 /var>mer<var 16 /var>cie<var 16 /var>ment.
